languages.text: "Меня дед так научил, он тоже был реколлигером и бригадиром. Мысли у него были крученые-верченые, но раз он до старости с ними прожил — с нашей-то профессией — значит, хорошие были мысли".

"It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."
languages.original_text: "Меня дед так научил, он тоже был реколлигером и бригадиром. Мысли у него были крученые-верченые, но раз он до старости с ними прожил — с нашей-то профессией — значит, хорошие были мысли".

traits.locale_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

"It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

"It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

"It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

"It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

languages.text: “这些都是我爷爷教给我的。他也是回收专员，还是个工头。他的脑子里装着很多华而不实的想法，但他却带着这些想法，一直活到了晚年——还是在我们这行。这意味着，有这样的想法并不完全是坏事。”
languages.original_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

traits.locale_text: “这些都是我爷爷教给我的。他也是回收专员，还是个工头。他的脑子里装着很多华而不实的想法，但他却带着这些想法，一直活到了晚年——还是在我们这行。这意味着，有这样的想法并不完全是坏事。”

languages.text: «Es lo que me enseñó mi abuelo, que también era recolector y capataz. Tenía muchas ideas complejas y sofisticadas en la cabeza, pero sobrevivió hasta la vejez con ellas en este trabajo, lo que significa que algunas tenían que ser buenas».
languages.original_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

traits.locale_text: «Es lo que me enseñó mi abuelo, que también era recolector y capataz. Tenía muchas ideas complejas y sofisticadas en la cabeza, pero sobrevivió hasta la vejez con ellas en este trabajo, lo que significa que algunas tenían que ser buenas».

languages.text: 「これは爺さんが私に教えてくれたことです。爺さんは回収業者で職長でもありました。頭の中に優雅な貴族様のような考えがありました。年を取って老いぼれるまで爺さんはその考えと一緒に生きたんです — 私たちの仕事では — そうした考えは悪い点ばかりではないんです」
languages.original_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

traits.locale_text: 「これは爺さんが私に教えてくれたことです。爺さんは回収業者で職長でもありました。頭の中に優雅な貴族様のような考えがありました。年を取って老いぼれるまで爺さんはその考えと一緒に生きたんです — 私たちの仕事では — そうした考えは悪い点ばかりではないんです」

languages.text: "Ich habe sie von meinem Opa, der war auch Recolliger und Vorarbeiter. Er hatte hochtrabende Ideen in seinem Kopf und ist damit sehr alt geworden – und das in unserem Beruf. Ganz schlecht können diese Ideen also nicht gewesen sein."
languages.original_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sie von meinem Opa, der war auch Recolliger und Vorarbeiter. Er hatte hochtrabende Ideen in seinem Kopf und ist damit sehr alt geworden – und das in unserem Beruf. Ganz schlecht können diese Ideen also nicht gewesen sein."

languages.text: « C'est ce que mon grand-père m'a appris. Il était récupérateur et contremaître. Il avait des idées bien arrêtées, mais il les a conservées jusqu'à un âge avancé... et dans notre métier, ça veut dire qu'elles n'étaient pas si mauvaises que ça. »
languages.original_text: "It's what my gramps taught me, he was a recolliger and a foreman too. He had some fancy-schmancy thoughts in that head of his, but he lived to a ripe old age with them — in our line of work — which means those thoughts weren't all bad."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce que mon grand-père m'a appris. Il était récupérateur et contremaître. Il avait des idées bien arrêtées, mais il les a conservées jusqu'à un âge avancé... et dans notre métier, ça veut dire qu'elles n'étaient pas si mauvaises que ça. »
